featured.text: The junk varies from tiny pieces of paint chipped off rockets to cameras, huge fuel tanks, and even odd items like the million-dollar tool kit that astronaut Heidemarie Stefanyshyn-Piper lost during a spacewalk.

definition.zh_def: 太空行走，指宇航員在太空中進行的活動，通常是在太空船外部進行的。
definition.en_def: A spacewalk is an activity in which an astronaut moves outside a spacecraft while in space.
definition.example: The astronaut completed a successful spacewalk to repair the satellite.
